turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hey there, how can i help?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, can you help me place a pick up order from Bella Luna?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: i sure can. what would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Two medium thin crust pizzas and I both want them to be veggy lovers.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, the order of 2 medium pizzas with thin crust, both veggie lovers comes out to $21.45.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: do you want me to place the order for you now?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, go ahead and place the order.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: i've submitted your order. It'll be ready for pick up in 35 mins.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Awesome. Thank you. I can't wait. I appreciate your help.
